item.title: Quick Start
item.description: This guide lets you quickly evaluate Mesh for Data. For a custom setup follow the Installation instructions. Before you begin Ensure that you have the following: git make kubectl version 1.

item.title: Installation Guide
item.description: Mesh for Data has been tested with OpenShift 4.3, kind 0.8 and Istio 1.8.0 This guide provides detailed installation instructions, including manual setup of connectors and modules. For a default installation without customizations please refer to Quick Start

item.title: Control Plane Security
item.description: Kubernetes NetworkPolicies and optionally Istio are used to protect components of the control plane. Specifically, traffic to connectors that run as part of the control plane must be secured. Follow this page to enable control plane security.

item.title: ODPi Egeria Install
item.description: This guide was tested against ODPi Egeria version 2.1 By default, ODPi Egeria is used as the data catalog. The steps below provide instructions on how to install ODPi Egeria in a Kubernetes environment.
